Name: Mountain Alpaca
About the game: Mountain Alpaca Avoid obstacle and use obstacle to climb mountain! 'Mountain Alpaca' is a game about climbing a mountain and adventuring with Alpaca. The way to clear stage is so simple You can use obstacle ex) trees, stones,etc.. to climb mountain and you can clear mountain stage if you survive and reach the portal. This game is very difficult and think endlessly how to use obstacle and to avoid obstacle. Can you break all the mountains level in this game? Clear stage and record your clear time on leaderborad! Few will finish this game. Save can be provided Repeat game to reduce your record Watch out for the rabbit
